name: LIVE from the KEEP
description:
Ladies and gentlemen, are you ready for the main event of the show ? It's time for a spooky night of wrestling, LIVE from the KEEP !

You're always the first on the ring and the last to leave: the Camera guy ! Follow Lucha Luv in the dark corridors of THE KEEP™, and don't miss a single action or you'll lose viewers. You've got to keep it live !

This game was created in 72 hours by a two-man team for Ludum Dare 46.

Code and music: Sylvain Delépée / Art: Anthony Dhaenens
